query:
WITH latest_runs AS (
            SELECT DISTINCT ON (workflow_uuid)
                workflow_uuid,
                status::text as status
            FROM workflow_runs
            ORDER BY workflow_uuid, queued_at DESC
        )
        SELECT 
            w.uuid,
            w.name,
            lr.status as latest_status
        FROM workflows w
        LEFT JOIN latest_runs lr ON w.uuid = lr.workflow_uuid
        ORDER BY w.name
